summary.span: 表示 对象的有序集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 但如前所述，此类的成员的行为如中所述完全， ，和文档。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable 功能：** 从继承，因此类，类提供多种特殊功能：可以声明对象，为在多个对象，变为只读以提高之间共享性能、 克隆以及变为线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关所提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreGeneralTransformObjectElements**oneOrMoreGeneralTransformObjectElements* 一个或多个声明使用对象元素语法的对象。One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.
